column1: It is good to have an end to journey toward; but it is the journey that matters, in the end.
The best type of thane lines are wipeout lines.
You wanna fly, you got to give up the sh#t that weighs you down.
Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
At 60 miles per hour...it's not that the fear isn't there....it just hasn't caught up yet.
Every longboarder wishes they lived in California.
You are not the victim of the world, but rather the master of your own destiny. It is your choices and decisions that determine your destiny.
There is only one way to get better and it's not going to happen on the internet.
Dogs always chase after me on my longboard.
No Skateboarding signs mean nothing. I'm on a longboard.
It's not the bearings that makes the rider fast, it's what's in the riders heart that gives him speed.
Longboarding is better for the earth because the only gas it uses comes from the rider.
